body_html:
@ppwwyyxx Could provide me with some information about the things and factors i need to know to help scale up?
or maybe refer me to a place where i can learn more about them and how to implement them as well. Since i was training an RGAN for a company i was interning at this summer and we found out that it is very challenging to scale up performance even though we used tfrecords.

body:
@ppwwyyxx Could provide me with some information about the things and factors i need to know to help scale up?
or maybe refer me to a place where i can learn more about them and how to implement them as well. Since i was training an RGAN for a company i was interning at this summer and we found out that it is very challenging to scale up performance even though we used tfrecords.
